name: Europeana Network Association
goal:
The goal of the Association is to support the long-term sustainability of Europeana and collectively influence and shape it by:
● using our individual expertise to encourage innovation and foster cross-border and cross-domain collaboration between people from cultural heritage, creative, technology, education and research areas;
● developing, validating and implementing the standards and frameworks that improve access and discovery;
● promoting Europeana’s activities within professional networks;
● participating in Europeana governance and strategy by electing 6 members for the Governing Board of Europeana; and supporting and advising the Board regarding its policy and business.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training
euInitiatives: The Association, being part of the overall Europeana initiative, is directly financed by the European Commission (DG CONNECT) through the procurement funding.
